plot: When cocky young hotshot Bode Wallace faces a life threatening situation in the bullpen, aging relief pitcher BJ Krud must decide just how far he's willing to go to get into the game.
title: Call to the Pen
plot_es: When cocky young hotshot Bode Wallace faces a life threatening situation in the bullpen, aging relief pitcher BJ Krud must decide just how far he's willing to go to get into the game.
plot_en: When cocky young hotshot Bode Wallace faces a life threatening situation in the bullpen, aging relief pitcher BJ Krud must decide just how far he's willing to go to get into the game.
